attributes.additional_details: Following on revelations of Mr Cameron's tax avoidance and related matters, and his response to those revelations.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, following revelations of the Prime Minister's tax affairs, affirm that we have no confidence in the Prime Minister and call on him to resign.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister or any other Minister is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
